snippet: The Met exhibition creates an imaginary dialogue between Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada. Parts of the dialogue will be included throughout the show.
abstract: Exhibition at the Costume Institute of the Metropolitan Museum of Art focusing on Italian fashion designers Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada includes dialogue assembled for the show's catalog and video installations; snippets give a sense of eavesdropping on the two iconic designers.
lead_paragraph: The Met exhibition creates an imaginary dialogue between Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada. Parts of the dialogue will be included throughout the show.

headline.seo: Elsa Schiaparelli and Miuccia Prada Meet at the Met
